mapper.select: SELECT A.VC_CD , VC_NAME , VC_DIVISION , VC_LIMIT_CNT , VC_DAY_LIMIT_CNT , VC_MONTH , VC_MINUTE , VC_USE_WEEK , VC_ENTER_FROM_TIME , VC_ENTER_TO_TIME , VC_RETURN_METHOD , B.VC_AMOUNT FROM DR_VOUCHER_CODE AS A INNER JOIN DR_VOUCHER_COST AS B ON A.CO_DIV = B.CO_DIV AND A.VC_CD = B.VC_CD AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE VC_DISPLAY_YN = 'Y' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY VC_SORT;
